price: Na sema: Hakika mimi ni mwonyaji mwenye kubainisha.
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie makafiri wote: Mimi nakuonyeni na adhabu kali, na nakubainishieni maonyo yangu kwa hoja za kukata.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
